availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Judicial body vested with authority in civil suits exceeding the sum of five hundred dollars, as a court of equity within the city limits of Baltimore, and with authority over all other civil cases not assigned to the Baltimore Court of Common Pleas.

ab.bibl: "Archives of Maryland: Historical List, Baltimore City Superior Court Clerks, 1851-1982," Maryland State Archives, Accessed August 18, 2022, https://msa.maryland.gov/msa/speccol/sc2600/sc2685/html/bcsupclerk.html.
